body.name: Battat – Plastic Toy Cars – 6-Pack & Storage Bag – Colorful Toddler Trucks – Easy To Clean – 2 Years + – Mini Monster Trucks
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: 6 mini Monster trucks: This playset comes with 6 mini toy trucks.
Tiny hands friendly: easy to grab and drive around the playground.
Plenty for everybody: perfect playdate toys, share the fun with 6 mini trucks
Indoor/outdoor fun: drive them around the living room or around the sandbox!
Textured wheels: create beautiful designs in the sand as you drive around the mini truck!
Storage bag: grab the handle and you're ready to go. Perfect beach toys for your next trip!
Safe and sturdy: made of strong and durable plastic. All of Battat's toys meet or exceed the highest safety standards.
Dimensions: 5. 5” (L) x 7. 5” (W) x 9" (H) for the carry bag; Each mini Monster truck is 4. 5” long
Age limit: each miniature Monster truck is recommended 2 years +
Trustworthy: Battat's a family-owned company, established in 1897.
body.description: Does your toddler love monster trucks? Give this toy truck set to your toddlers for pretend play. Featuring 6 monster trucks in vibrant colors, these toddler toys can be played with indoors or outdoors. Turn the beach, park, playground, backyard, and other spaces into a racecourse or whatever else your child imagines as they play with these mini monster trucks. The different color combinations and large wheels will hold your child’s attention as they create new adventures for their toys. Pack these toy trucks away in the convenient bag once your kids finish playing or carry the 6 monster trucks with you to keep your child’s toys handy during travel. The carry bag measures 5.5” (L) x 7.5” (W) x 9" (H) while each truck measures around 4.5-inches long.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mini Monster Trucks Light & Sound School Bus 3-Car Garage Pound & Count Bench Target Development Fine-Motor & Imagination Imagination Cause & Effect Emotions & Counting Material Plastic Plastic Plastic Wood Recommended Age 2 Years + 18 months + 2 Years + 12 months +

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and affordable.
reviews.reviewText: Loved the price of these cars and that it came with multiple. The colors are bright which is perfect for toddlers. The wheels are not a choking hazard and that was my main reason for buying it. It does have to be manually pushed unlike other cars that can rev up and go on their own, but the cars are fast! Cool monster truck toys for little hands. They seem built to last since my son has thrown the cars multiple times!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2+ Years, Still Going Strong
reviews.reviewText: We’ve had these trucks going on 2 years, and these are my #1 recommendation for both toddlers and toddler parents!They’re lightweight but sturdy, durable and versatile, large and fun enough to keep my son’s attention (got them when he was 12 months, he’s now 3) YET small enough to stick in a diaper bag and not be overly obnoxious wherever we are.They’ve traveled with us to the beach, the pool, the sandbox, the airport, playgrounds and restaurants. Have never rusted, lost a wheel, anything—these things are seriously indestructible!We keep one in our diaper bag at all times. And it’s a bonus that there’s a bunch of them, so you’ll always have one when you need it!Add this to your cart now. You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These monster trucks are great.They are sturdy and very colorful.We used them on long gutters elevated and they were pretty bashed around by the children in my classroom.We also used them for painting and discovered that the tires make really cool paint designs on the paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: Love these! We bought a bunch for our OCC boxes. They are perfect for little hands. My boys love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got these trucks for our 2-year-old son and he loves them. I was a little hesitant at first but the quality of these is great! I love the size of them as well they aren't too big but they aren't small either, perfect for toddler hands! They would be the perfect gift for any toddler who loves cars/trucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic starter monster trucks
reviews.reviewText: These are hard plastic so very easy to clean. Fun to play with and easy for little hands to grip. I find them all over the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy ! Withstands the rough and tumble baby/toddlers! Bright colors that make them appealing to the eye. Good quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: This set comes with a bag for storage. It is perfect for my nephew.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good size, good quality, good price
reviews.reviewText: Good quality ! Pretty big size which I like. I like that it comes packaged in the storage container ! Always a plus for me. Noticed they’re Squeaky when the wheels turn. Axles are metal so can’t take in the bath if anyone was wondering. My son loves!
Colores brillantes carritos de buena calidad, de uso rudo con su bolcita para transpórtarlos

Me decidí a comprarlos porque mi hijo es fan de los vehículos y, recientemente, de los monster truck. Soy muy fan de esta marca, tengo varios vehículos que me han salido buenísimos y genial de precio. Son de muy buena calidad y aguantan todas las palizas y golpes que mi hijo les da.Debo decir que el tipo de plástico no es el mismo que el del resto de vehículos grandes que he comprado, pero, aún así, el plástico es resistente. Los otros son de plástico reciclado y color mate, este es más brillante, pero estoy igualmente encantada y mi hijo más.Son muy coloridos, de buen tamaño y van muy fluidos al lanzarlos.Teniendo en cuenta la gran cantidad de juguetes que tenemos y, justo todos los de esta marca son sus favoritos.Como digo en cada reseña de producto que compro, repetiré seguro.

Questo marchio è una garanzia di qualità. Le macchinine da spiaggia sono piaciute tantissimo ai miei bambini di 2 e 5 anni: costruite molto bene, bei colori e design semplice ma funzionale. Dopo un utilizzo intensivo tra acqua salata, sabbia e sole si mantengono molto bene, pronte per un altro giro in spiaggia. Recapitate con una custodia in plastica, comoda ma che non ho utilizzato... testando la durabilità del prodotto all'interno di un contenitore più ampio a contatto con altri giochi: resistono.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent pour faire un petit cadeau
reviews.reviewText: J'ai acheté ce petit lot car je trouvais les couleurs sympa. Les mini camion sont de bonnes taille et ont l'air solide. Mon neveu étais très content de les recevoir ( il a 2ans)
